hot sandwiches.description: There may or may not be tears in your sub, depends on if we took our meds today

desserts.name: Mr. Lemonface
desserts.decription: Do you like cookies but also hate yourself? If so, try and keep a straight face whilst eating this cookie

desserts.name: Fred
desserts.description: We got sick and tired of people point at him but never knowing what to call him. So his name is now Fred. If you want a Fred then ask for him by name, stop pointing and being rude.

ingredients: A shit ton of corn syrup
